mapper.select: select ma.no as managerno, c.no as cvsno, me.name, c.name as spot, c.brand, c.storecode, c.profit from manager ma join member me on ma.member_no = me.no join cvstore c on ma.no = c.manager_no where ma.no = #{no}
update cvstoreproduct set enrollment = 0 , enrolledprice = null , enrolledlefttime = null where no = #{no}

select count(*) as cnt from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvsp.cvstore_no = #{cvstore_no} and cvsp.enrollment != 2
and ROUND((cvsp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0

select count(*) as cnt from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvsp.cvstore_no = #{cvstore_no} and cvsp.enrollment = 1
and ROUND((cvsp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0 and ROUND((cvsp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) <= 24

select count(*) as cnt from cvstore cvs join cvstoreproduct cvsp on cvs.no = cvsp.cvstore_no join productlist p on cvsp.productlist_no = p.no where cvsp.cvstore_no = #{cvstore_no} and cvsp.enrollment = 0
and ROUND((cvsp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) > 0 and ROUND((cvsp.expirationdate - sysdate) * 24) <= 24
select no from manager where manager.member_no= (select no from member where id=#{id})
mapper.update: update manager set storecode=#{storecode} where no=#{managerno}
update cvstore set manager_no=#{managerno} where storecode=#{storecode}
